english_translation: A place without sound alone is not the environment of silence
The sign of silence is in the harmony of the image (or mind's picture).

kannada_original: ಸತತ ತುಂಬಿದ ಭಾವ ಈ ಸುಖದ ಪರಿಭಾಷೆ
english_transliteration: Satata tumbida bhāva ī sukhada paribhāṣe
english_translation: Constantly filled feeling is the definition of this happiness
Is it the grace of the silent Siddhas! – Muddu Rama.
